keyMoments.title: Sogeking's Heroic Rescue Shot
keyMoments.description: Usopp, as Sogeking, successfully snipes Spandam from the Tower of Justice, demonstrating the Straw Hats' determination to rescue their crewmate Robin at any cost.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's unwavering commitment to each other and their willingness to take on the World Government to save one of their own.

keyMoments.title: Facing the Buster Call
keyMoments.description: The Buster Call fleet arrives at Enies Lobby, forcing the Straw Hats to face the World Government's most devastating military assault while trying to rescue Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats' courage in facing overwhelming odds for their crewmate and marks them as a serious threat to the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Spandam Struck by Sogeking
keyMoments.description: CP9 chief Spandam is hit by Sogeking's snipe attack, preventing him from delivering Robin to the Gates of Justice and representing a major setback for the organization.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of CP9's failure to complete their mission to transfer Robin, undermining their reputation as an elite World Government agency.

keyMoments.title: Buster Call Fleet Arrives
keyMoments.description: Five Marine Vice Admirals (Strawberry, Yamakaji, Doberman, Onigumo, and Momonga) command a fleet of ten warships that arrive at Enies Lobby to execute the Buster Call, a devastating military assault.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the World Government's willingness to sacrifice its own stronghold to prevent Robin from escaping, showing the extreme measures they'll take to maintain control.
